overview: Wanting to keep her first hot-wifing experience completely anonymous, a blindfolded, Casey anxiously awaits a stranger's arrival. With only her sense of touch and taste, Brooklyn's husband challenges her to an erotic guessing game involving one of their closest friends. Using deprivation, handcuffs, and a blindfold, Erik taunts his insatiable wife, Dana with the promise of sex with a man she's never met. Ryan discovers that watching his wife become sexually unhinged in the hands of a man she cannot see is the ultimate foreplay.
title: A Hotwife Blindfolded
